tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE leed_certification_progress (
    project_id UUID,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    certification_status VARCHAR(50),
    certification_date DATE,
    documentation_path VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE project_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT REFERENCES green_building_projects(project_id),
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    created_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT, 
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    document_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_certifications (
    project_id INT,
    agency_id INT, 
    certification_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (project_id, agency_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES certification_agencies(agency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    changes VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);
